name: The Nameless Maid Playtest
description:
Recommend to play in fullscreen.

*noted that Blood magic and Earth magic are not completed. Please avoid choosing them.

*Currently there are 7 distinct rooms in the room pool.

Next Update: Music, Sound Effects, Earth Elements Sprites, More Room Pool, .exe playtest, Title screen

*If the current version is laggy please let me know! (V.0.1.0) (Scroll down for known bugs)

WASD : movement

Space : select element

Shift : dash

E : interact

P/Esc : Pause

M1 : normal attack

M2 : tier-1 spell

S + M2 : tier-2 spell

[;] : debug display

Known bugs: 

1. Mana bar color remains white, 

2. Blood magic tier-1 not working, 

3. In-game loot and chest are dark in color, 

4. If perk selection appears exactly when the scene is fading the scene will remain dark in the next scene

5. Fireball and probably some other projectile fail to launch if standing inside wall

6. After leveling up, the element information bar below the health bar will not refresh.

7. Framerate dropped after restarting a couple of times.

8. After every restart, old decorative trees remain, causing there to be more in the next round.
